title: Electronic Field Trip Design and Implementation for STEM Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A blended teaching methodology combining real-time online interaction and field learning to enhance STEM education content design and execution capabilities

learning_goals: Students can understand the design principles of electronic field trips (EFT) and apply them to actual STEM education scenarios
Students can devise real-time science communication strategies utilizing mobile technology and wireless internet environments
Students can develop EFT content through a collaborative process with teachers, scientists, and technology experts.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
